infoPlist.NSCameraUsageDescription: This app needs access to camera to take photos for job applications and documents.
infoPlist.NSPhotoLibraryUsageDescription: This app needs access to photo library to select images for job applications and documents.
infoPlist.NSMicrophoneUsageDescription: This app may need access to microphone for video recordings or voice notes.
infoPlist.NSLocationWhenInUseUsageDescription: This app needs location access to help you find nearby job opportunities.
infoPlist.NSContactsUsageDescription: This app needs access to contacts to help you network and share job opportunities.
infoPlist.NSRemindersUsageDescription: This app needs access to reminders to help you track job application deadlines and interviews.
infoPlist.NSCalendarsUsageDescription: This app needs access to calendar to schedule interviews and job-related events.

plugins.cameraPermissionText: This app needs access to camera to scan QR codes and barcodes on parts.
